title: New Fortress Energy’s Delinquent Payments Mount Amid Debt Talks
description: New Fortress Energy said Friday that it struck new forbearance agreements with holders of its term loans after failing to make interest payments and informing the lenders that it didn’t plan to make principal payments due at year-end.
content: New Fortress Energy said Friday that it struck new forbearance agreements with holders of its term loans after failing to make interest payments and informing the lenders that it didn’t plan to make principal payments due at year-end.
